title: Test object parameter reference in Mojito JS Delivery
description: The test object contains everything an experiment needs to run, including the trigger, tracking information and recipe code (or variants). When you pass all this information into the Mojito.addTest() function, Mojito will execute all the logic in your experiment based on its order of execution.
